description.raw:
Distributed simulation handshake between primary and secondary system plugins.

Also adds an EventManager object to give plugins the ability to emit/receive `Event` objects, similar to how it worked in Gazebo9.  The main difference is that Events are no longer static, and are on a per SimulationRunner basis.

The plugins currently get their configuration information from SDF files. Setting simulation affinity TBD.

Depends on: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/156/replace-explicit-templates-with-variadic](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/156/replace-explicit-templates-with-variadic)
